help.Description: output a of list commands and global arguments or output help about a command

Syntax.commandName: help about the command with name commandName

Texts.CommandShortHelpNotFound: short help text not found for command: {0}
Texts.CommandLongHelpNotFound: long help text not found for command: {0}
Texts.GlobalArgHelpNotFound: help text not found for global argument: {0}
Texts.MissingOptionValue: missing argument parameters at index {0} for argument '{1}''
Texts.TooManyArguments: too many arguments. maximum allowed is {0}
Texts.NotEnoughArguments: not enough arguments. minimum allowed is {0}
Texts.NoArgumentValueAtIndex: the argument {0} doesn't have any value at index {1}'
Texts.GenericTypeWithMoreThanOneArgumentNotSup: generic type with more then 1 type argument is not supported: '{0}'
Texts.CollectionTypeHasNoMethodAdd: the type '{0} has no method 'Add' that would allow to use it as a collection parameter type
Texts.ExpectedParameterValue: expected parameter value '{0}' at position '{1}', but found: '{2}'
Texts.ExpectedOption: expected option '{0}' at position '{1}', but found: '{2}'
Texts.UnableToConvertValue: unable to convert value from text '{0}' to type '{1}'
Texts.GlobalOptionsMustBeAtEndOfTheCommandLine: the global options can appears only at the end of the command line. error on '{0}'
